title: Understanding Data Inventory Tags
text: Consider the purpose of data inventory tags. What role do they play in managing your data?

title: Retention Policies and Automation
text: Think about how retention policies can be linked to your data tags. How might this help in automating data management processes?

title: Data Classification Representation
text: Reflect on how data tags can serve as representations of data classification. Why is this important for data management?

title: Choosing the Best Answer
text: Now that you've considered the roles of data tags, retention policies, and data classification, which option best encompasses all these aspects?
choices: You can configure your tags with retention policies so that your automated deletion programs can process deletion at scale
Your tags are representations of your data classification
